subject.physique: Slim, fit figure with fair skinned tone
subject.hair: Long, dark brown, sleek and straight with a center part, draping behind shoulders
subject.face: Soft glam makeup, defined eyebrows, neutral to soft expression, looking slightly off-camera to the left

attire.material: Satin or silk finish with a sheen
design_details: Sweetheart neckline with a prominent bow tied at the center bust
Draped short sleeves resting on upper arms
attire.footwear: Clear (transparent) strap high-heeled sandals showing white pedicure
attire.accessories: Minimalist silver stud earrings, simple rings

pose.stance: Standing on a staircase, weight shifted to the back leg, front leg stepped down and slightly forward
pose.arms: Relaxed at sides, fingers gently grazing the hem of the bubble skirt
pose.angle: Full-body shot, slightly low angle to accentuate leg length

environment.location: Grand interior staircase within a luxury building or mansion
architecture: Ornate black wrought-iron railing with a polished wooden handrail on the left
Classic white wall paneling and molding
Black and white checkered marble flooring at the base
decor: Framed oil painting hanging on the upper wall
White plaster relief sculpture (draped fabric style) mounted on the wall directly behind the subject
Red upholstered chair visible in the upper background

lighting_and_atmosphere.shadows: Subtle shadows cast against the wall and stairs, highlighting the texture of the dress

technical_specifications.texture_detail: High fidelity fabric textures, skin texture, and marble reflections
technical_specifications.camera_settings: DSLR, portrait focal length (e.g., 85mm), shallow depth of field background
